question: India organised “ASEAN-India Network of Think Tanks (AINTT)” conference along with which country?
explanation:
The Union Ministry of External Affairs in collaboration with the Thailand’s Foreign Ministry has organized the 6th Round Table of ASEAN-India Network of Think Tanks (AINTT). The round table conference was conducted virtually.
The theme of the conference was 'ASEAN-India: Strengthening Partnership in the Post COVID Era'. More than 400 eminent members from various educational institutions, industry, government and diplomats attended the Round Table.
